abstract: STX Entertainment announces it has secured financing from Chinese conglomerates Tencent Holdings and PCCW in order to further its push into television, music and digital media.
lead_paragraph: The conglomerates Tencent and PCCW join existing investors in the Hollywood company known for midbudget films.
snippet: The conglomerates Tencent and PCCW join existing investors in the Hollywood company known for midbudget films....

headline.main: STX, Hollywood Start-Up Behind ‘Bad Moms,’ Gains Chinese Investors
headline.print_headline: Hollywood Firm Lands Key Investor From China
